DataElement.preferredName: PROMIS Item Bank v2.0 Cognitive Function Short Form 4a Less Than 12 Score Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Indicator of whether participant scored less than 12 on the PROMIS Item Bank v2.0 - Cognitive Function - Short Form 4a.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: PROMIS Item Bank v2.0 - Cognitive Function - Short Form 4a Less Than Twelve Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: : A 4-item short form of the PROMIS v2.0 Cognitive Function scale. It assesses difficulties with leisure activities, family activities, doing usual work (in and out of the home), and doing desired activities with friends:A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A natural number greater than 11 and less than 13 and the quantity that it denotes._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: PROMIS Item Bank v2.0 - Cognitive Function - Short Form 4a
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: : A 4-item short form of the PROMIS v2.0 Cognitive Function scale. It assesses difficulties with leisure activities, family activities, doing usual work (in and out of the home), and doing desired activities with friends

Concepts.longName: PROMIS Item Bank v2.0 - Cognitive Function - Short Form 4a
Concepts.definition: A 4-item short form of the PROMIS v2.0 Cognitive Function scale. It assesses difficulties with leisure activities, family activities, doing usual work (in and out of the home), and doing desired activities with friends.

Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A natural number greater than 11 and less than 13 and the quantity that it denotes._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A natural number greater than 11 and less than 13 and the quantity that it denotes.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.2.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Retired DBW 04-27-2016 per Tina Taylor approved by Dianne Reves

ReferenceDocuments.name: PQT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Does the participant have a score of less than 12 (4 -11) on the PROMIS Adult v2.0 - Cognitive Function 4a?
